fontTheory.description: The typography system is designed to convey a modern and professional look suitable for a resume/CV. It aims to provide a clean and organized layout for easy readability.
fontTheory.readability: Readability is prioritized by using clear sans-serif fonts for body text and headings. Monospace font is used for code snippets to enhance readability in technical sections.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Typographic hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles. Headings are distinct from body text, creating a clear visual structure.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Font pairings are chosen based on complementary styles and readability. Montserrat and Roboto offer a harmonious combination for headings and body text, while Inconsolata provides a contrast for code elements.
